con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="FlightServiceService" targetNamespace="http://flightservice.arif.com/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://flightservice.arif.com/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://flightservice.arif.com/"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="Flightservice.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="updateFlight"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:updateFlight"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="updateFlightResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:updateFlightResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getFlightsByAirlineName"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:getFlightsByAirlineName"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getFlightsByAirlineNameResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:getFlightsByAirlineNameResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="FlightNotFoundException"> <wsdl:part name="FlightNotFoundException" element="tns:FlightNotFound"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="FlightService"> <wsdl:operation name="getFlightsByAirlineName"> <wsdl:input name="getFlightsByAirlineName" message="tns:getFlightsByAirlineName"/> <wsdl:output name="getFlightsByAirlineNameResponse" message="tns:getFlightsByAirlineNameResponse"/> <wsdl:fault name="FlightNotFoundException" message="tns:FlightNotFoundException"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="updateFlight"> <wsdl:input name="updateFlight" message="tns:updateFlight"/> <wsdl:output name="updateFlightResponse" message="tns:updateFlightResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="FlightServiceServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:FlightService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getFlightsByAirlineName"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="getFlightsByAirlineName"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getFlightsByAirlineNameResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="FlightNotFoundException"> <soap:fault name="FlightNotFoundException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="updateFlight"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="updateFlight"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="updateFlightResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="FlightServiceService"> <wsdl:port name="FlightServicePort" binding="tns:FlightServiceServiceSoapBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:9721/FlightService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema version="1.0" elementFormDefault="unqualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://flightservice.arif.com/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://flightservice.arif.com/"> <xs:complexType name="getFlightsByAirlineName"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="airlineName" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="getFlightsByAirlineNameResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="return" type="tns:flight"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="flight"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="flightId" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="flightNum" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="airlineName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="source" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="destination" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="departureTime" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="arrivalTime" type="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="updateFlight"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="flight" type="tns:flight"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="updateFlightResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="return" type="tns:flight"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="FlightNotFound" type="tns:FlightNotFound"/> <xs:complexType name="FlightNotFound"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="flightName" nillable="true" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="updateFlight" type="tns:updateFlight"/> <xs:element name="updateFlightResponse" type="tns:updateFlightResponse"/> <xs:element name="getFlightsByAirlineName" type="tns:getFlightsByAirlineName"/> <xs:element name="getFlightsByAirlineNameResponse" type="tns:getFlightsByAirlineNameResponse"/> </xs:schema>
